price: cuyo último sorbo deja un sabor a almizcle. ¡Que se esfuercen por alcanzarla los aspirantes!
arabic: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: khitāmuhu mis'kun wafī dhālika falyatanāfasi al-mutanāfisūna
